title: Updates Coming Soon! Discover a New Way of Living at Riverstation Apts
posting_body: > Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!
If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.
Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.
Additional availability outside our community's normal office hours is available BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.
Please contact our on-site management & leasing team at any time via phone or email at any time for additional information.
Our community offers gorgeous two, three & four bedroom apartment homes – all at an affordable price!
Set in a prime Dallas location, our surrounding neighborhood contains many dining, shopping and various entertainment options!
Each apartment home incorporates everything you’re looking for in a home.

Featuring include open floorplans with energy efficient kitchen appliances, dishwasher & garbage disposal, walk-in closets, tons of natural sunlight, an additional storage area AND a private patio or balcony space.

A number of fantastic community amenities are also available at Riverstation which include a beautiful community clubhouse, convenient on-site laundry facility, sparkling outdoor swimming pool, gated entry access, outdoor playground and a 24-hour emergency maintenance service.
Don’t wait & give us a call to schedule a personal tour of your new home today.
- Prime Location Minutes From Downtown Dallas
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Riverstation Apartments participates in an affordable housing program.

Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $42,000 | 2 Occupants: $48,000 | 3 Occupants: $54,000 | 4 Occupants: $60,000 | 5 Occupants: $64,800 | 6 Occupants: $69,600 | 7 Occupants: $74,400 | 8 Occupants: $79,200.
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
Call today to learn more about our community:
